content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day May 25, 2021 SolarMarker Backdoor Pretends to be Legit PDFescape Installer May 25, 2021 The modified installer of legit PDFescape Desktop Installer app looks like this Fake PDFescape Desktop Installer AppSHA-256 0c933001de544ebc071d175d9f8e3bfad8066b532dc69dea4c713c52eb6a64a0 Cyren detects this kind of malware as W32SolarMarker.A.gen!Eldorado. Upon execution, It creates an encoded file under Userdirrandomcharsrandomcharsrandomcharsrandomcharsrandomcharsrandomcharsrandomchars encoded file.
